name: Collect The Scraps
description:
Poor little neko-chan. She got stuck at her day job at the factory and is now collecting left over scraps for reasons unknown.

A/D - Move left or right

Collect the scraps

Watch out for bomb-chans

Time Log:

45 mins - Asset Development/Acquiring

2 hours - Design and Develop

15 mins - play testing, debugging, building
